### 

```{r}
val <- "1.5 millones"

met <- "Confirmados"

datos <-  c(
  "Dato interesante 1",
  "Dato interesante 2",
  "Dato interesante 3"
  )

cap <- purrr::map2(datos, length(datos):1, function(x, y){
  
  spn <- tags$span(x)
  
  if(y == 1) {
    return(spn)
  }
  
  shiny::tagList(spn, tags$br())
  
}) 

cap <- tags$span(
  # style = "display: flex; flex-direction: column;",
  tags$b(met), tags$br(), shiny::tagList(cap)
  )

valueBox(
  val,
  caption = cap,
  icon = "fa-check"
  )
```
